import React, { useState } from "react"; export default function Addarrangament(props){ const [arrangement,setArrangament]=useState({ name:"", price:"", transport:"", smestaj:[], programi:[], }) const {name,price,transport,smestaj,programi}=arrangement; const onInputChange=(e)=>{ setArrangament({...arrangement,[e.target.name]:e.target.value}) } return(
